cu.explanation_en: Setting ASN.1 verbosity to an unknown enum 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing errors and system startup failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting max MIMO layers to an invalid high value of 100 will cause hardware configuration failure and radio unit initialization errors.
du.explanation_zh: 將最大 MIMO 層數設定為無效的高值 100，會導致硬體配置失敗，並造成無線單元初始化錯誤。
